suggest.spryker/event: If you want to use Event plugins, minimum required version: 2.1.0
suggest.spryker/propel-orm: If you want to use transaction functionality, minimum required version: 1.3.0
suggest.spryker/search: If you want to use Search plugins, minimum required version: 7.0.0
suggest.spryker/category: If you want to use lists Category relations, minimum required version: 3.0.0
suggest.spryker/customer: If you want to use lists Customer plugins, minimum required version: ^7.0.0
